item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DOJ will push Google to sell off Chrome (582 points | 644 comments)
2. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (354 points | 112 comments)
3. It's hard to stop Math Acceleration once you start (45 points | 30 comments)
4. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (431 points | 234 comments)
5. $8k Suzuki from India received a 5-star crash test rating (164 points | 135 comments)
6. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (119 points | 28 comments)
7. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (309 points | 79 comments)
8. Building Observability with ClickHouse (27 points | 8 comments)
9. How to Build a Quantum Supercomputer: Scaling Challenges and Opportunities (4 points | discuss)
10. 20 years of Google Scholar (286 points | 136 comments)
11. Listen to what gets lost when an MP3 is made (2015) (20 points | 9 comments)
12. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (55 points | 10 comments)
13. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (120 points | 13 comments)
14. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (229 points | 70 comments)
15. Rim/Blackberry tales – reply all (7 points | 1 comment)
16. Batched reward model inference and Best-of-N sampling (11 points | discuss)
17. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (267 points | 492 comments)
18. New textbook teaches students about matrix methods and their real world apps (40 points | 10 comments)
19. Scientific American's departing editor and the politicization of science (96 points | 105 comments)
20. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (54 points | 26 comments)
21. Museum of Bad Art (171 points | 122 comments)
22. PyTorch 101: Understanding Graphs, Automatic Differentiation and Autograd (26 points | 2 comments)
23. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (253 points | 106 comments)
24. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (52 points | 43 comments)
25. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (217 points | 222 comments)
26. Rats Learned to Drive–and They Love It (172 points | 76 comments)
27. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (13 points | 3 comments)
28. The tragedy of running an old Node project (113 points | 140 comments)
29. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (182 points | 44 comments)
30. Retro beige PC case goes from April Fools' joke to retail (73 points | 29 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
